quest.name: Doubt Truth to Be a Liar
journal: In times of simmering hostility, Ser Cailean would undoubtedly appreciate the aid of an unsuspected adventurer.

The Garlean Empire is making a long arm across the border from Mor Dhona, stirring the grass around Monument Tower. Seek traces of Garlemald in three locations, and drive away any Garleans you encounter.
Your vigilance has driven out all the Garleans in the area without a confrontation between the forces of Ishgard and Garlemald. Report to Ser Pierremons that the work is done.

Ser Pierremons is aghast at how thick the Garleans are upon the ground. All evidence points to a Garlean outpost in Mor Dhona, a place in which even an adventurer may find it no easy task to escape deadly scrutiny...
objectives: Report to Pierremons at the Aurum Vale.

dialogue.name: CAILEAN
dialogue.text: I say, are you the─ Forgive me, I am Cailean, a bannerman of House Haillenarte. Are you not the adventurer who proved our liege lord's innocence?

dialogue.name: CAILEAN
dialogue.text: Ah, it is you! You are forged of metal true, madamsir, and I rejoice to meet you, for there is a delicate mission that only a womanman most steadfast may be trusted with.

dialogue.name: CAILEAN
dialogue.text: From high upon Monument Tower, we keep watch over the doings of the Garlean outpost. They have been far too active for our hearts' ease lately, and we must discourage these forays without resorting to outright hostility.

dialogue.name: CAILEAN
dialogue.text: Make a round of the three hot spots and look for any trace of the Garleans. Ser Pierremons awaits at the Aurum Vale for your report. The speed of the Fury to you, and Her ruth as well.

dialogue.name: IMPERIALSOLB
dialogue.text: You ask if I'm a soldier of Garlemald? Why, this savage land is outside the fold of the Empire! 'Twould be strange indeed for you to see a Garlean here. You doubt me? I care not!

dialogue.name: IMPERIALSOLB
dialogue.text: Why would a soldier of Garlemald venture into enemy territory? An enemy foolish as well as barbaric, for none can resist our─what I mean to say is the mighty Garl─damn it, retreat, retreat!

dialogue.name: IMPERIALSOLB
dialogue.text: What lowly adventurer dares pluck at my coat thus? I am a soldier, and therefore your better. I've no call to tell you any more, and a pout would suit you better than that pitiful doubt.

dialogue.name: PIERREMONS
dialogue.text: What? All three? You found Garleans at all three locations?

dialogue.name: PIERREMONS
dialogue.text: We'd espied them slipping over the border from Mor Dhona to survey something, but... These forays must be more frequent than we thought.

dialogue.name: PIERREMONS
dialogue.text: We must increase patrols in the area. I bid you beware, adventurer, if your footloose ways lead you to Mor Dhona. Return safely, and be our eyes in the wilderness again.

dialogue.name: POP
dialogue.text: Strangers are nearby...and they smell of engine oil!
